Package io.gearpump.streaming.partitioner

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MulticastPartitioner  
    Partitioner
    For processor chain: A (3 tasks) -> B (3 tasks), partitioner decide how ONE task of upstream processor A send to several tasks of downstream processor B.
    PartitionerFactory  
    UnicastPartitioner
    For processor chain: A (3 tasks) -> B (3 tasks), UnicastPartitioner does ONE-task -> ONE-task mapping.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BroadcastPartitioner
    Used by storm module to broadcast message to all downstream tasks
    CoLocationPartitioner
    Will have the same parallelism with last processor And each task in current processor will co-locate with task of last processor
    GroupByPartitioner<T,GROUP>
    Partition messages by applying group by function first.
    HashPartitioner
    Only make sense when the message has implemented the hashCode() Otherwise, it will use Object.hashCode(), which will not return same hash code after serialization and deserialization.
    PartitionerByClassName
    Store the partitioner in class Name, the user need to instantiate a new class
    PartitionerDescription
    param: partitionerFactory How we construct a Partitioner.
    PartitionerObject
    Stores the Partitioner in an object.
    ShuffleGroupingPartitioner
    The idea of ShuffleGroupingPartitioner is derived from Storm.
    ShufflePartitioner
    Round Robin partition the data to downstream processor tasks.
